title: The Search
description: MISSING!Where is Meg Falconer?Everybody wants to know. Her brother Aiden, who saw her kidnapped and is now trying to track her down, wants to know. The FBI, led by the very serious Agent Harris, wants to know. Her parents, who fear their pasts have something to do with why Meg was taken, want to know.Even Meg's kidnappers want to know. Because catching her doesn't always mean keeping her.
author: Gordon Korman
